Element.Name: TAX TOTAL
Element.Description: The total TAX amount for the Invoice.

Element.Name: The total TAX amount for the Invoice.
Element.Description: The total TAX amount for the Invoice or the TAX total amount expressed in the accounting currency accepted or required in the country of the Seller. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals

Element.Name: TAX BREAKDOWN
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about TAX breakdown by different categories, rates and exemption reasons

Element.Name: TAX category taxable amount
Element.Description: Sum of all taxable amounts subject to a specific TAX category code and TAX category rate (if the TAX category rate is applicable).

Element.Name: TAX category tax amount
Element.Description: The total TAX amount for a given TAX category.

Element.Name: TAX category code
Element.Description: Coded identification of a TAX category.

Element.Name: TAX category rate
Element.Description: The TAX rate, represented as percentage that applies for the relevant TAX category.

Element.Name: TAX exemption reason code
Element.Description: A coded statement of the reason for why the amount is exempted from TAX.

Element.Name: TAX exemption reason text
Element.Description: A textual statement of the reason why the amount is exempted from TAX or why no TAX is being charged.
